Title: ⚡️🌟🚀[ANN]CRAZYCOIN - ICO MOBIL GAME.⚡️🌟🚀
Body: ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________  Crazy Shapes: Run Adventure                                       ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________                http://s019.radikal.ru/i644/1710/16/60289115111d.jpg http://s56.radikal.ru/i154/1710/db/eb282b41c093.jpg http://s009.radikal.ru/i309/1710/52/b3109596c67d.jpg http://s010.radikal.ru/i313/1710/e4/e42409b2c3c3.jpg  Built on WAVES PLATFORM Listed on Decentralised Exchange (DEX) Our identifier - hydgissBYYVuavKePVtswHgNoggRRy2mxcmhfgNeRgF (CrazyCoin)   http://s009.radikal.ru/i308/1710/8f/e39cf428bc6e.png http://i013.radikal.ru/1710/e8/6d5dbc79c3a2.png http://s02.radikal.ru/i175/1710/d7/cea1266a3375.png http://s019.radikal.ru/i628/1710/d8/a04c9bade195.png http://s018.radikal.ru/i523/1710/da/8745da016899.png http://s016.radikal.ru/i337/1710/f3/cd3edab487da.png  http://s16.radikal.ru/i190/1709/f1/d0dae619c5f0.png  _______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________  Creating a new site  Friends!) Now we hasten to share the nearest plans! We hasten to start developing a new site that will give you the following opportunities.  First, the site will be able to buy in-game currency, as well as in-game items and all sorts of bonuses; Secondly, the site will sell attributes with logos and prints of Crazy Shapes and our company (for the most dedicated fans); Thirdly, the site will be able to buy all the in-game items of our future projects (yes, other games will be developed when the active process of work on Crazy Shapes is over); Fourth, you can make purchases using Crazy Coin (our own crypto currency). And buy Crazy Coin will also be on the site, not on any third-party resources.  So the site will become a single entry point for acquaintance with all projects of the company, it will be easy to buy in-game items and company attributes).  Previously, the site will be launched in March 2018.  _______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________  What can you buy for CrazyCoin?  With a Crazy Coin you can buy:  -Internal currency (solars);  -In game boosters;  -Exclusive levels;  -Unique modes;  -Attribute.  The cost of the token will grow because the popularity of the game.

Author: cryptoj@ck
Title: ⚡️🌟🚀[ANN]CRAZYCOIN - ICO MOBIL GAME.⚡️🌟🚀
Body: You mention they will 'probably' be on a certain exchange, do you not have a specific roadmap of how these can be traded? No point investing in something that you can't buy and sell at your convenience.
